metadata.description: Perky little silver-haired "Chrissie Klausewitz" may appear at first glance to be just another pretty, bouncy freshman cheerleader at the Northwestern University, but there's more, much more to her than meets the eye!  The truth is she's really Santa's elfin granddaughter, CHRISSIE CLAUS!  She's the one in charge of the designer division of Santa's workshop.  She's the one who sneaks out on Christmas Eve to make sure even "bad" boys and girls get something for the holidays.  And because her mother is the Queen of Faerie, Chrissie has some very special magical powers.
metadata.name: Chrissie Claus
